column5: I was just looking at the website for Missinaibi Park and here is what is posted:    NOTE: Missinaibi will remain closed until Friday, May 9th due to unseasonable temperatures and snow accumulation on the main road.    So, I'm wondering if anyone knows what the weather is suppose to do the next couple of weeks up that way....and if there is still Ice on the lakes up there.  May change the way we fish a bit....just wondering!!  Thanks. dk
Weather network The Weather Network shows the average temp. below seasonal (14 deg.) until the 19th of May, where it starts to climb....
